headline: Jim Cramer on Simon Property’s CEO: “We Think David Simon’s the Best Mall Operator There Is”
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Starting the round of “Am I Diversified,” a club member mentioned that their top five holdings are SPG, AMZN, AVGO, LNG, and VICI. Cramer replied: Wow, you’re diversified, but we may have to do some work anyway, just in terms […]
